QuestData.Title: Future of the Flights
QuestData.Description:
There is no higher charge given to a drakonid upon their graduation than to defend every single dragon egg with their lives.
It's why we train. Why we exist.
I can no longer hide and observe, $p. By stealing and infusing these eggs, the Primalists threaten the entire future of the dragonflights!
We are vastly outnumbered, but will you stand by my side? Will you fight to save the dragonflights?
QuestData.RewardText:
<Sendrax is clearly shaken by what she had to do.>
Death was the only mercy left to those poor whelplings...
